Beauty_Economy.question: What is more important to you: investing in stocks or investing in self-care products?
Which do you consider a better investment: a luxury handbag or a high-end watch?
Would you rather save money by doing your own makeup or invest in professional makeup services?
Which is a more sustainable beauty choice: buying eco-friendly cosmetics or making your own beauty products at home?
options: Making own beauty products at home

How much are you willing to spend on a single beauty product?
Which has a greater impact on the economy: the beauty industry or the fashion industry?

options: Personal financial education and wealth-building tools

I spend based on my economic situation
I limit spending on beauty products due to my economic situation
